remarks: The second component of an arrow is the corresponding morphism (without the domain/codomain tag).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
arwrcl.a $e |- A = ( Arrow ` C ) $.
arwhom.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` C ) $.
arwhom $p |- ( F e. A -> ( 2nd ` F ) e. ( ( domA ` F ) J ( codA ` F ) ) ) $.
